meta.og_twtr_desc: News and Events from the Chaminade Campus and Ohana.
meta.og_type_article_author: Office of University Communications and Marketing

hero.title: New Career Pathways for Students
hero.intro: Chaminade University and Pacific University partner to provide students with new opportunities to pursue careers in health professionsâ€¦

articles.title: Healthcare with Cultural Sensitivity
articles.intro: School of Nursing students provided health screenings and wellness education while learning how to be sensitive to Native Hawaiian culture.

articles.title: A Night of Leadership Lessons and Networking
articles.intro: The Hogan Entrepreneurs Kick-Off provided students the opportunity to meet business leaders and learn about 'spiritual confidence.'

articles.title: The Show Goes On
articles.intro: Showcasing their talents, the Pacific Islander Cultural clubs celebrated diversity through performances at the annual Pacific Island Review event.

articles.title: 'All Things Marianist' Episodes 1 & 2
articles.intro: As a way to highlight Marianists on campus, the Marianist Educational Associate are producing monthly videos to highlight Marianists at different levels.

articles.title: 2018 Announcement
articles.intro: Our premier early season basketball tournament features the strongest field in history.

events.title: You're Invited
events.intro: Please join the celebration as Clarence T. C. Ching Hall is dedicated.

events.title: WIT
events.intro: Chaminade Performing Arts presents Margaret Edson's Pulitzer prize winning play.

events.title: Inter-Faith Prayer Service
events.intro: The gathering celebrates people from all faiths and spiritual traditions, giving thanks together. All are welcome. Lunch will be provided.

events.title: Christmas Lighting Ceremony
events.intro: What a great way to start the holiday season! All are welcome to the annual lighting of campus.  Meet at Clarence T. C. Ching Hall where the festivities begins.
